articles.title: How do I get ITVX on TV and Sky? What is different to ITV Hub? - Daily Mail
articles.description: ITVX is the brand new streaming service from ITV, which replaces ITV Hub. Complete series of shows yet to debut on terrestrial television are available, as well as catch-up TV, box sets and films.
articles.content:
ITVX is the brand new streaming service from ITV, which boasts 10,000 hours of catch-up TV, box sets, movies and more.
It will also debut brand new shows six to nine months before they appear on ter… [+5555 chars]

articles.title: Lesley Land, ‘Much-Loved’ Channel 4 Publicist, Dies - Variety
articles.description: Popular on Variety Lesley Land, a longtime publicist at U.K. public broadcaster Channel 4, has died. She was 41. Variety understands Land died unexpectedly at home last Friday. She had worked at Channel 4 for eight years, predominantly on popular factual and …
